definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: This paper presents a method to realize the storage and playback of multi-video and audio file.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種實現多路音視頻文件的存儲和回放的方法。

sentences.english: The government released the video without sound because it did not want to disseminate a terrorist message.
sentences.chinese: 政府公佈的無音視頻，因爲它不希望傳播恐怖信息。
